name.baseName: a local branded pure milk productions ; Raw milk production
本地品牌纯牛奶生产 ; 生奶生产

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The location of the raw milk production is dairy farms, where the main consumptions are fodder, electricity, and diesel.
原料奶生产的地点是奶牛场，主要消耗饲料、电力和柴油。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The Tetra Pak 1litre pure liquid milk is selected to assess its lifecycle based carbon footprint.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The milk source base is located at Hongya Country, Southwestern Sichuan Province, China, about 147 kilometres far from Chengdu City, the provincial capital. The diary processing plant is located at Pixian, suburb of Chengdu City, which is about 175 kilometres far from the milk source base. The branded milk is mainly distributed to the central Chengdu City, about 40 kilometres distances from the diary processing plant. The milk packaging waste is transported to the municipal landfill for final disposal, about 30 kilometres away from the central city.
奶源基地位于中国四川省西南部洪崖县，距离省会成都市约147公里。乳品加工厂位于成都郊区郫县，距离奶源基地约175公里。品牌牛奶主要分布在距离乳制品加工厂约40公里的成都市中心。牛奶包装废弃物被运送到距离市中心约30公里的市政垃圾填埋场进行最终处理。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: This study only focused on processes that directly contributed to pure milk production, that is, only the effects of energy and material input and carbon emissions, as shown in Figure 1. The system boundary of milk life cycle is thus simplified and divided into four stages, namely, raw milk production, dairy product processing, product transportation and packaging waste disposal.
本研究仅关注对纯牛奶生产有直接贡献的过程，即仅关注能源和材料投入以及碳排放的影响，如图1所示。从而简化了牛奶生命周期的系统边界，将其划分为原料奶生产、乳制品加工、产品运输和包装废弃物处理四个阶段。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set describes the full life cycle of a local branded pure milk production, which includes raw milk production at dairy farms and subsequent processing. The milk produced is intended for consumer consumption as a nutritional and food product. This Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) data set would be particularly useful for the dairy industry, food product manufacturers, and environmental analysts looking to quantify the environmental impacts of milk production, from dairy farming to distribution.
该数据集描述了本地品牌纯牛奶生产的完整生命周期，包括奶牛场的原材料牛奶生产和随后的加工过程。生产的牛奶旨在作为营养和食品产品供消费者消费。这个生命周期评估（LCA）数据集对乳品行业、食品产品制造商和希望定量评估牛奶生产环境影响的环境分析师特别有用，内容包括从乳品养殖到分销。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Compared with the conventional LCA, the process of life cycle impact assessment is simplified in this study, as it mainly uses different categories of indicators to elaborate results of life cycle inventory (Nigri et al., 2014).
与传统的LCA相比，本研究简化了生命周期影响评估的过程，主要使用不同类别的指标来阐述生命周期清单的结果(Nigri et al.， 2014)。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Table 1 shows the inventory data during the raw milk production stage, which are obtained by analogy to Hospido et al. (2003) on milk LCA. The location of the raw milk production is dairy farms, where the main consumptions are fodder, electricity, and diesel. From a conversion of the results obtained by Hospido et al. (2003) on GHG emissions factors from farm fodder and equipment disinfectant, a corresponding CO2 emission coefficient is obtained for the calculation. The electricity emission factor is based on the 2014 Baseline Emission Factors for Regional Power Grids in China, released by National Development and Reform Commission, of which the Central China power-grid emission factor is used in this study. The operating margin emissions factor is 0.972 t CO2/MWh, and the build margin emissions factor is 0.47 t CO2/MWh (NDRC, 2014). Through the conversion, the power grid emission factor is 0.723 kg/kW·h.

表1显示了原料奶生产阶段的库存数据，这些数据是通过类比Hospido et al.(2003)对牛奶LCA的研究得出的。原料奶生产的地点是奶牛场，主要消耗饲料、电力和柴油。将Hospido et al.(2003)关于农场饲料和设备消毒剂的温室气体排放系数的结果进行换算，得到相应的CO2排放系数用于计算。电力排放因子基于国家发改委发布的《2014年中国区域电网基线排放因子》，本研究使用中部电网排放因子。运行边际排放系数为0.972 t CO2/MWh，建设边际排放系数为0.47 t CO2/MWh(国家发改委，2014)。经换算，电网排放系数为0.723 kg/kW·h。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Zhao, R., Xu, Y., Wen, X., Zhang, N. & Cai, J. Carbon footprint assessment for a local branded pure milk product: a lifecycle based approach. Food Sci. Technol 38, 98–105 (2017).
Zhao, R., Xu, Y., Wen, X., Zhang, N. & Cai, J. Carbon footprint assessment for a local branded pure milk product: a lifecycle based approach. Food Sci. Technol 38, 98–105 (2017).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When applying this LCA data, users must consider the specific regional context (e.g., Sichuan, China) as environmental impacts may vary by location. This data set relies on a simplified version of the life cycle impact assessment which uses specific indicators. It is advised to update emission factors and methodological approaches to ensure relevance and accuracy. Additionally, users should note the consumption of fodder, electricity, and diesel in the production phase and apply appropriate CO2 emission coefficients and electricity emission factors sourced from Hospido et al. (2003) and the NDRC (2014). Pay attention to the specific treatment of end-of-life waste (e.g., milk packaging) as it is transported to a landfill for disposal.

使用此LCA数据时，用户必须考虑特定区域环境（如中国四川），因为环境影响可能因地点而异。数据集依赖于简化版的生命周期影响评估，使用特定指标。建议更新排放因子和方法学途径以保证数据的相关性和准确性。此外，用户应该注意生产阶段饲料、电力和柴油的消耗，并应用相应的CO2排放系数和电力排放因子，这些数据源自Hospido等人（2003）和国家发展和改革委员会（2014）。需注意最终废弃处理（如牛奶包装）的特定处理方式，因为它们被运送到垃圾填埋场处置。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
